pull.title: Simplify feebumper minimum fee code slightly
pull.body:
No change in behavior. Get rid of specifiedConfirmTarget if/else block and
rename specifiedConfirmTarget and ignoreUserSetFee variables to
ignoreGlobalPayTxFee.

events.message:
Simplify feebumper minimum fee code slightly

No change in behavior. Get rid of specifiedConfirmTarget if/else block and
rename specifiedConfirmTarget and ignoreUserSetFee variables to
ignoreGlobalPayTxFee.

events.body:
Make much more sense like this.
utACK 88b8f0b682271195d20c097660c8e7d4d19e4e44

comments.body: Can you add a comment here like: "If the user has explicitly set a confTarget in this rpc call then override the default logic that uses the global payTxFee instead of tx confirmation target if a payTxFee is set"
